description:
Expect to see Walder Frey again before “Game of Thrones” concludes.期待在《权力的游戏》完结之前看到瓦德·佛雷。

While promoting his FX series “The Strain” at 2015 summer TV press tour, actor David Bradley confirmed to Zap2it he’s been told “Thrones” has plans for his character, the mastermind behind the Red Wedding.演员大卫·布拉德利在2015夏季电视新闻之旅上宣传他的FX电视剧《血族》时，对Zap2it证实有人通知他《权力的游戏》正筹划他的角色——血色婚礼的策划者。

“He will be coming back, but I can’t say when,” Bradley says of Walder, though he wouldn’t reveal if he’ll appear in Season 6. “I can’t really say because things are in a delicate situation.”“他会回来，但我说不准什么时候，”布拉德利谈了瓦德，但他没有透露他是否会出现在第六季。“我不能真的说，因为现在的局面很微妙。”

“Game of Thrones” is currently filming its sixth season, and is expected to run in the range of eight seasons. Bradley last appeared on the HBO series in 2013 in the Season 3 finale, after executing the biggest betrayal in the show’s history at the Red Wedding. It’s because of him that main characters Robb Stark and Catelyn Stark were murdered, and fans have demanded justice ever since.《权力的游戏》目前正在拍摄第六季，并预计拍摄长达八季。布拉德利最后一次出现在HBO的电视剧里是在2013年第三季的结局，上演了本剧历史上最大的背叛血色婚礼。主角罗柏·史塔克和凯特琳·史塔克正是因为他而被谋杀，自此影迷们要求伸张正义。

“Walder Frey only appeared in three episodes of “Thrones,” and Bradley says he “can’t wait” to reprise the role.“瓦德·佛雷只在《权力的游戏》出现了三集，”布拉德利说，他“迫不及待”地想再次出演这个角色。

title: 《权力的游戏》血色婚礼策划者回归
